同學好： 
112-2初選將於12/18(一)中午12:30開始分階段選課，
請參考【網路選課系統】之相關時程。
https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/AA/CLASS/subjselect/Default.aspx?lang=tw

1、大學部延畢生依選課學分數按比例收取學雜費
      https://rb004.ndhu.edu.tw/p/404-1004-175369-1.php?Lang=zh-tw
2、研究生初選學分費併入註冊繳費單
3、申請就學貸款同學請記得辦理初選，以利核算貸款金額。

※請同學謹慎選課!!


Dear students：
The preliminary course selection for next semester begins at 12:30pm on Dec.19th (Mon.) , phased for different grade students.
Please click the【Course Selection System】 for more information.
https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/aa/class/subjselect/Default.aspx?lang=en

The tuition and fees for the fifth and above year undergraduate students will be charged proportionally to the enrolled course credits.
The registration fee for graduate students has counted the credit fee of the preliminary course selection.
Please carefully consider selecting your courses.
